library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggnewscale)
library(ggrepel)
library(scales)
library(showtext)

font_add_google("Roboto Condensed", "roboto")
font_add_google("Inter", "inter")
showtext_auto()


pins4 <- read_delim(
  "HIBP 4 digit wordlist heat.txt", delim = " : ", col_names = FALSE
)
colnames(pins4) <- c("pin", "count")

pins4 <- pins4 |>
  mutate(first2 = substr(pin, 1, 2), last2 = substr(pin, 3, 4))

# Get most and least common PINs
most_common <- pins4 |> arrange(desc(count)) |> slice(1)
least_common <- pins4 |> arrange(count) |> slice(1)

# Get most and least common PINs
most_common <- pins4 |> arrange(desc(count)) |> slice(1)
least_common <- pins4 |> arrange(count) |> slice(1)

p <- ggplot(pins4, aes(x = last2, y = first2, fill = count)) +
  geom_tile() +
  coord_fixed(ratio = 1) +
  scale_fill_gradient(
    low = "black",
    high = "#c84072",
    trans = "log1p",
    breaks = c(1e3, 1e4, 1e5, 1e6, 2.5e6),
    labels = c("1K", "10K", "100K", "1M", "2.5M"),
    name = "PIN USAGE"
  ) +
  scale_x_discrete(breaks = function(x) x[seq(1, length(x), by = 5)]) +
  scale_y_discrete(breaks = function(x) x[seq(1, length(x), by = 5)]) +
  # Add annotations
  geom_text(
    data = most_common,
    aes(label = pin),
    color = "yellow",
    hjust = 0,
    nudge_x = 1,
    size = 3
  ) +
  geom_text(
    data = most_common,
    aes(label = paste0("most-common")),
    color = "yellow",
    vjust = -1,
    nudge_x = 2,
    size = 3
  ) +
  geom_point(
    data = most_common,
    aes(x = last2, y = first2),
    color = "yellow",
    fill = "yellow",
    shape = 21,
    size = 0.4,
    stroke = 1
  ) +
  geom_text(
    data = least_common,
    aes(label = pin),
    color = "yellow",
    hjust = 0,
    nudge_x = 1,
    size = 3
  ) +
  geom_text(
    data = least_common,
    aes(label = paste0("least-common")),
    color = "yellow",
    vjust = -1,
    nudge_x = 2,
    size = 3
  ) +
  geom_point(
    data = least_common,
    aes(x = last2, y = first2),
    color = "yellow",
    fill = "yellow",
    shape = 21,
    size = 0.4,
    stroke = 1
  ) +
  labs(
    title = "Four-Digit PIN Usage",
    x = "LAST TWO DIGITS",
    y = "FIRST TWO DIGITS"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(
      face = "bold", size = 15,
      hjust = -0.16, family = "roboto",
      color = "gray20"
    ),
    axis.title = element_text(face = "bold", size = 12),
    axis.text = element_text(size = 10, color = "gray50"),
    axis.ticks = element_line(color = "gray50"),
    axis.title.x = element_text(
      family = "roboto", hjust = 0,
      vjust = -1, size = 8,
      color = "gray30"
    ),
    axis.title.y = element_text(
      family = "roboto", hjust = 0,
      vjust = 1, size = 8,
      color = "gray30"
    ),
    legend.title = element_text(
      face = "bold", family = "roboto",
      size = 10, color = "gray30"
    ),
    legend.text = element_text(
      family = "inter", size = 6,
      color = "gray20"
    ),
    legend.position = "top",
    legend.justification = c(1, 1),
  ) +
  guides(
    fill = guide_colorbar(
      title.position = "top",
      title.hjust = 0,
      barwidth = 10,
      barheight = 0.5
    )
  )

p
